description: Try our easy to follow Mango, Pineapple & Mint Popsicles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mango, Pineapple & Mint Popsicles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut mango and pineapple into 1cm pieces. Transfer to a food processor, add 1/2 cup water and pulse until smooth. Stir chopped mint through fruit mixture.
Pour into popsicle moulds then insert popsicle sticks into the centre of each.
Freeze for 4 hours or until completely frozen.
